name: Wood Block Puzzle Classic
description:
Are you a fan of Block Puzzle Games? Looking for a puzzle game to train your brain?
Block Puzzle Classic is exactly the fun game for you! Easy to play game and ideal for all ages.

How To Play
- Drag the blocks to move them into board.
- The goal is to put blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.
- Game will be over if there are no room for any the shapes below the grid.
